content:
I actually tried to take some astrophotography shots during my camping trip to Big Sur, but they didn't turn out as great as I had hoped. I'm still learning the ropes of night photography, so I'm hoping to improve my skills for my next trip.

As for new gadgets or gear, I've been eyeing a new portable stove that's supposed to be more efficient and compact than my current one. I've also been considering a waterproof action camera to capture some underwater footage during my kayaking trips.
